verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

By <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> we <S%G2476>stand,<s%> and <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And not <S%G3440>only<s%> so, but we <S%G2744>glory<s%> in <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> <S%G5281>patience;<s%>
And <S%G5281>patience,<s%> <S%G1382>experience;<s%> and <S%G1382>experience,<s%> <S%G1680>hope:<s%>

And <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2617>makes<s%> not <S%G2617>ashamed;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G1632>abroad<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to us.
For when we were <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G772>without<s%> <S%G772>strength,<s%> in <S%G514>due<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for the <S%G765>ungodly.<s%>

For <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> for a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> man will <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G599>die:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> <S%G5029>peradventure<s%> for a <S%G18>good<s%> man <S%G5100>some<s%> would even <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G599>die.<s%>
But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4921>commends<s%> his <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> us, in that, while we were <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for us.

<S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> being <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> by his <S%G129>blood,<s%> we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> from <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him.

For <S%G1487>if,<s%> when we were <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> we were <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> by the <S%G2288>death<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more,<s%> being <S%G2644>reconciled,<s%> we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> by his <S%G2222>life.<s%>

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> so, but we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>joy<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G2643>atonement.<s%>

<S%G1223>Why,<s%> <S%G5124><s%> as by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2288>death<s%> by <S%G266>sin;<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1330>passed<s%> on <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> for that <S%G3956>all<s%> have <S%G264>sinned:<s%>
(For <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> was in the <S%G2889>world:<s%> but <S%G266>sin<s%> is not <S%G1677>imputed<s%> when there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> from <S%G76>Adam<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them that had not <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> the <S%G3667>similitude<s%> of <S%G76>Adam's<s%> <S%G3847>transgression,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G5179>figure<s%> of him that was to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

But not as the <S%G3900>offense,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is the <S%G5486>free<s%> <S%G5486>gift.<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> through the <S%G3900>offense<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G1431>gift<s%> by <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is by <S%G1520>one<s%> man, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> has <S%G4052>abounded<s%> to <S%G4183>many.<s%>

And not as it was by <S%G1520>one<s%> that <S%G264>sinned,<s%> so is the <S%G1434>gift:<s%> for the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was by <S%G1520>one<s%> to <S%G2631>condemnation,<s%> but the <S%G5486>free<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> is of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3900>offenses<s%> to <S%G1345>justification.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> by <S%G1520>one<s%> man's <S%G3900>offense<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> by <S%G1520>one;<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> they which <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> and of the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> shall <S%G936>reign<s%> in <S%G2222>life<s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>)

<S%G686>Therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> as by the <S%G3900>offense<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> judgment came on <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G2631>condemnation;<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> by the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> the free gift came on <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G1347>justification<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

For as by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G3876>disobedience<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> by the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> shall <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3922>entered,<s%> that the <S%G3900>offense<s%> might <S%G4121>abound.<s%> But <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4121>abounded,<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> did <S%G5248>much<s%> more <S%G5248>abound:<s%>

That as <S%G266>sin<s%> has <S%G936>reigned<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> might <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
